channel.title: Talk: Whats New With Team Foundation Server
channel.description: Tonight at NIMTUG I'm going to be giving a talk to get everyone up to speed with the latest developments in the Team Foundation Server world. We are going to review what came along in 2008, talk about the...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Sajee+00:00
item.description:
Hi Martin: Nice deck. Here's a VSTS 2010 deck in case you're interested. I incorporated content from a number of source like C9, PDC, blogs, etc. Hopefully, ppl will find it useful.
A Lap Around Visual Studio Team System 2010
item.dc:creator: Sajee

item.title: Comment by Mark+00:00
item.description: There's an asterisk next to Explorer integration on the TFS Powertools slide. Is that just because it is an optional component - or is there more to the story?
item.dc:creator: Mark

item.title: Comment by Martin Woodward+00:00
item.description: The asterisk was just to represent bits that are new in the latest version of the powertools. Sorry for any confusion. M.
item.dc:creator: Martin Woodward

item.title: Comment by Martin Woodward+00:00
item.description: Great deck there Sajee! I wish I'd just asked you before doing my talk - would have saved me a lot of time :-)
item.dc:creator: Martin Woodward
